thread.title: Adele Pays Tribute to Beyonce's Lemonade at Grammys - Adele Wears Lemon Brooch at Grammys 2017
thread.title_full: Adele Pays Tribute to Beyonce's Lemonade at Grammys - Adele Wears Lemon Brooch at Grammys 2017

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Adele Pays Tribute to Beyonce's Lemonade at Grammys - Adele Wears Lemon Brooch at Grammys 2017
text:
Beyoncé and Adele are up against each other for Album of the Year Award at tonight's Grammys but the competition, it seems, is more than friendly. Adele hit the red carpet in a green gown by Givenchy Couture and if you looked too fast, you may have missed her sartorial homage to Queen Bey. The singer accessorized her look with a yellow jeweled lemon brooch—a subtle nod to Beyoncé's Lemonade .
Adele is wearing a lemon pin! She knows whats good! #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/SGYaXnMhKf
— FORMATION (@CameToSlayBitch) February 13, 2017
 Is there anything better than two queens supporting each other?
